name: Kies Sync Duplicate File
summary: A DUP0 file is a duplicate media file created by Samsung Kies , a backup and data transfer application for Samsung smartphones and tablets. It contains a copy of an image, audio file, or movie stored on your Samsung device. DUP0 files are created when you sync your Samsung device with your PC using Kies.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
